title: SEAN MARTIN Rejoins 100 DEMONS, Working On New Material For First Time in Over Two Decades
description: After 20 years, 100 Demons is working on new material. The post SEAN MARTIN Rejoins 100 DEMONS, Working On New Material For First Time in Over Two Decades appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: After 20 years, 100 Demons is working on new material.
text: Latest News SEAN MARTIN Rejoins 100 DEMONS, Working On New Material For First Time in Over Two Decades After 20 years, 100 Demons is working on new material. 100 Demons have just announced they are welcoming back returning guitarist Sean Martin to their lineup. This news comes a year after the passing of 100 Demons guitarist, Erik Basset. Due to the addition of Martin, the band have also announced that they're working on the material for the first time in 20 years. Check out what 100 Demons had to say below. "@100demons203 would like to formally announce and welcome our brother and new bass player Sean Martin @theresidualeffects back into the mix. We are also excited to announce we are well into writing our first record in over 20 years. Lots of great things happening in 2025. Love each and every one of these guys. We’ve been playing together our whole lives. See you all soon." Want More Metal? html:
Latest News

SEAN MARTIN Rejoins 100 DEMONS, Working On New Material For First Time in Over Two Decades

After 20 years, 100 Demons is working on new material.

100 Demons have just announced they are welcoming back returning guitarist Sean Martin to their lineup. This news comes a year after the passing of 100 Demons guitarist, Erik Basset.

Due to the addition of Martin, the band have also announced that they're working on the material for the first time in 20 years.

Check out what 100 Demons had to say below.

"@100demons203 would like to formally announce and welcome our brother and new bass player Sean Martin @theresidualeffects back into the mix. We are also excited to announce we are well into writing our first record in over 20 years. Lots of great things happening in 2025. Love each and every one of these guys. We’ve been playing together our whole lives. See you all soon."
